column4: Microsoft to give away Windows 10  unveils hologram glasses
column5: SEATTLE Microsoft Corp  will give away its upcoming Windows 10 operating system as a free upgrade to users of the most recent versions of Windows and Windows Phone  as the world's largest software company tries to retain customers in the mobile era.

column4: UPDATE 5-ASML shares hit record after fourth quarter tops forecasts
column5: * Shares hit record high before easing  up 0.6 percent   (Updates shares  writes through)

U.S. chipmaker Advanced Micro Devices Inc  forecast weaker-than-expected first-quarter revenue and said it taking steps to return its computing and graphics businesses to a "healthy trajectory" from the second quarter.

column4: Samsung drops Qualcomm processors in next Galaxy S: report
column5: SEOUL Samsung Electronics Co Ltd  will not use Qualcomm Inc's  processors for the next version of the South Korean technology giant's flagship Galaxy S smartphone  Bloomberg reported on Wednesday  citing unidentified sources.
